text: The Aussie Backyard Bird Count is a project of BirdLife Australia. It is a citizen science project in which volunteers conduct bird counts around Australia. \- \- In the 2017 bird count, almost two million birds were counted. ==See also== *Australian Bird Count *BioBlitz ("24-hour inventory") *Breeding Bird Survey *Christmas Bird Count (CBC) (in the Western Hemisphere) *Systematic Census of Australian Plants *Tucson Bird Count (TBC) (in Arizona in the US) ==References== Category:Bird censuses Category:Ornithological equipment and methods Category:Ornithology in Australia
title: Aussie Backyard Bird Count
